name: MLCEmbeddingLayer
desc: A layer that stores a word embedding.

items.name: init(descriptor: MLCEmbeddingDescriptor, weights: MLCTensor)
items.desc: Creates an embedding layer with the descriptor and word embedding weights tensor you specify.

items.name: class MLCEmbeddingDescriptor
items.desc: A configuration object you use to create an embedding layer.

items.name: var descriptor: MLCEmbeddingDescriptor
items.desc: The configuration object you use to create the embedding layer.

items.name: var weights: MLCTensor
items.desc: The weights tensor that contains the word embedding.

items.name: var weightsParameter: MLCTensorParameter
items.desc: The tensor parameter that describes the weights for the optimizer update.
